Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Bmecum
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit so i could make room where i have all my cameras wired in at I was using an old computer . This unit was inexpensive and has a lot of good reviews.When it got here i took it out of the box i was amazed at how lightweight it is and compact.I have a mixture of wired and wirless cameras ,I plugged all the cameras in and turned it on and there were all my cameras, great picture too.The only draw back is that the operaters manual is on cd so I have to have my lap top to work on the programing.all in all its a great deal and works flawlessly,and its much easier to connectto wiyh my kindle and iphone.

Reviews.Title: dvr 8
Reviews.Author: JustMe
Reviews.Content: all great except i see ghost image scroll across screen on some cams. (this could be cams fault) but didn't ever happen on last dvr.  also first dvr bought i could review from first recording event to last without clicking mouse again. now i have to click on each event one at a time.

Reviews.Title: smartphone compatable??  not really
Reviews.Author: Kathy Bays
Reviews.Content: no manual, its on the disc.  no software, they send you to a third party vendor (PFF) which is useless.  I sprang the $29.95 for the fullproof guaranteed port forwarder, and guess what, this model is not even on the list.  Pff doesn't let you contact them by phone or email, only on forums, and it takes up to 48 hours to respond.  No customer friendly device here for sure. works great on pc, but I wouldn't have sprung for the smart phone one if that wasn't a requirement for me.  will probably return if PFF doesn't answer.  Will be upset I had to spend 30 more bucks if they do resolve it.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price.
Reviews.Author: Joe Takayama
Reviews.Content: Would have liked a hard copy of a owners manual instead of disk.  Setup was not that difficult once I got used to using the menus.  Have not had time to set up the smart phone application.  Time will tell how much information the 1TB hard drive will hold.

Reviews.Title: easy start up
Reviews.Author: michael d saxe
Reviews.Content: Was very easy to connect to my existing system. Instructions were simple to follow. Quality is good. Would recommend to other for business

Reviews.Title: No problem
Reviews.Author: Percy Sabinay
Reviews.Content: I installed all different type of camera and it works good 420 TVL and 700 TVLall works good even at night.

Reviews.Title: 2nd Defender purchase...
Reviews.Author: eric pyle
Reviews.Content: Well, this is the second Defender DVR I have purchased. The first worked fairly well, with some  minor glitches, for a little over a year, but, I had disreguarded the manufacturer's instructions and installed the unit in my attic. Not good. Too hot. 1 fried hard drive/hard drive controller later, I was in the market for a replacement. I went with Defender again, for the following reasons...1.) Reliability...the first unit would no doubt still be working, if I hadn't installed it in a hot, dusty environment. 2.) Familiarity...I am very familiar with the user interface and all of my cameras are Defender 420 lpi indoor/outdoor units that work well. The DVR arrived in a timely manner (actually 1 day BEFROE the first estimated delivery date!) and the delivery company slid thie box into a plastic bag, since it was raining. The box was in good shape, no dings, dents or other blemishes. I proceeded to connect all the power, camera, and LAN cables and was up & running in 5 minutes!

Reviews.Title: Nice Unit For The Money
Reviews.Author: David Chabot
Reviews.Content: The hardware for this unit seems to be fairly well built and comes with a 1 Tb hard drive for the same money as most units without a hard drive.  The software seems to be fairly easy to use and is pretty straight forward.  I installed the mobile app and set up my router to forward the correct port to the unit but it is not working yet.  I am sure it is something simple that I will figure out when i get a couple minutes to look at it.  The software is running, it is just having trouble connecting to the unit.  All in all I would say it is a very good buy if you are looking for a unit that does everything you need, even selective motion detection, comes with a lot of features and a hard drive for a very reasonable price, this is the unit to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great inexpensive system!
Reviews.Author: Mike Miller
Reviews.Content: This has been a really great inexpensive system we have been using for a while now. The picture quality is actually rather nice and the police are very happy with the quality. I would definitely recommend this to others.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: rose
Reviews.Content: was exactly as stated. works great. It was easy to set up. Would recommend for anyone to use for their security systems.
